item.title: Ocata release install scripts for OpenStack
item.description: Ocata is the most recent release of OpenStack. I would like to share scripts that can be used to install the Ocata is the most recent release of OpenStack. I would like to share scripts that can be used to install the server as per the installation guide. This is a collection of scripts that should help you get going with OpenStack’s latest release. I have been developing these scripts to help me with my blogging and personal learning projects
